movie.title: When Angels Fall
movie.description_intro: A church bell chimes. An old woman stops to feed pidgins on her way to work in the men's lavatory in the basement of a public building. She sits all day by the lavatory door as little dramas play out -- of illness, assignation, and routine -- a few tips her only acknowledgment. The sound of footsteps on the floor above her brings a reverie of her youth, when she was a beauty, the day a platoon of soldiers marched into her valley. As the day in the basement proceeds, she completes a set of memories that takes her from passion to maternal love to rejection and tragedy. Could there be more awaiting her on this day of remembering the fruit of her womb?
movie.description_full: A church bell chimes. An old woman stops to feed pidgins on her way to work in the men's lavatory in the basement of a public building. As the day in the basement proceeds, she completes a set of memories that takes her from passion to maternal love to rejection and tragedy. Could there be more awaiting her on this day of remembering the fruit of her womb?

movies.title: Prison Song
movies.summary: A young man lives and learns while growing up on the street and in and out of correctional facilities.
movies.description_full: A young man lives and learns while growing up on the street and in and out of correctional facilities.
movies.synopsis: A young man lives and learns while growing up on the street and in and out of correctional facilities.

movies.title: Play it, Boogie-Woogie
movies.summary: A young cat burglar begins a love triangle with a reckless older man and her on-again-off-again bonehead biker boyfriend.
movies.description_full: A young cat burglar begins a love triangle with a reckless older man and her on-again-off-again bonehead biker boyfriend.
movies.synopsis: A young cat burglar begins a love triangle with a reckless older man and her on-again-off-again bonehead biker boyfriend.

movies.title: The Great Waldo Pepper
movies.summary: A biplane pilot who had missed flying in WWI takes up barnstorming and later a movie career in his quest for the glory he had missed, eventually getting a chance to prove himself in a film depicting the dogfights in the Great War.
movies.description_full: A biplane pilot who had missed flying in WWI takes up barnstorming and later a movie career in his quest for the glory he had missed, eventually getting a chance to prove himself in a film depicting the dogfights in the Great War.

movies.title: Om Shanti Om
movies.summary: Om Prakash Makhija is a Junior Artist in the 1970's hindi film industry, who is in love with actress Shantipriya. Om rescues Shanti from a fire scene where the fire has escaped control, and they become friends. His hopes seems to be coming true, but shortly thereafter he finds out that she is married to a film producer, Mukesh Mehra, and is expecting his child. He then watches in horror as Mukesh, after luring her in an abandoned studio, sets it on fire to prevent a financial loss and protect his career. Om attempts to rescue her in vain, and he eventually is killed. 30 years later, Om has reincarnated as the only son of a Bollywood actor, Rajesh Kapoor, and is himself an actor. His memories start to return when he meets with his widowed mother, Bela, from his previous birth. He also meets with Mukesh and together they decide to make a movie 'Om Shanti Om'. Om then hires a look-alike of Shantipriya, and hopes to force a confession out of Mukesh - but things go awry and Om finds his ...
